channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: OpenAI starts testing ads in ChatGPT
item.description: Users on ChatGPT's free and Go plans in the US may now start to see ads as OpenAI has started testing them in the chatbot. The company announced plans to bring ads to ChatGPT. At the time, the company said it would display sponsored products and services that are relevant to the current conversations of logged-in users, though they can disable personalization and "clear the data used for ads” whenever they wish.“Our goal is for ads to support broader access to more powerful ChatGPT features while maintaining the trust people place in ChatGPT for important and personal tasks,” OpenAI wrote in a...

item.title: The BBC’s Not Saying How It’ll Fund ‘Doctor Who’ After Its Disney Breakup
item.description: BBC Studios production chief Zai Bennett offers only vague updates on the future of the sci-fi series.

item.title: Apple is killing the old HomeKit tomorrow
item.description: If you haven't yet updated to the new Apple Home, your smart home devices may no longer work in the Home app on your iPhone, iPad, Mac, or Apple Watch starting tomorrow. On February 10, 2026, Apple will end support for the original HomeKit architecture. The biggest impact of the change will be felt by […]

item.title: Best Buy's Presidents' Day deals are off with a bang with these exceptional wireless headphones offers — grab a stellar set of cans from just $49.99
item.description: The Presidents' Day sales have begun at Best Buy, and you can land some serious savings on awesome headphones, starting from just $49.99.

item.title: Microsoft starts the countdown for the end of Exchange Web Services
item.description: Microsoft has set out its roadmap to fully retire Exchange Web Services from April 2027, after around 20 years of service.

item.title: « C’est pour votre bien » : voici comment Discord va vérifier votre âge
item.description: À partir de mars 2026, si vous refusez de prouver que vous êtes majeur, votre compte Discord sera bridé. La plateforme déploie un système de scan facial pour séparer les adultes des mineurs.

item.title: Here's how to disable Ring's creepy Search Party feature
item.description: Ring aired a Super Bowl ad touting its Search Party feature that didn't quite get the intended buzz. Instead, the commercial scared the pants off of anyone concerned about a mass surveillance state. The feature is advertised as a way to reunite missing dogs with their owners, a noble cause indeed, but Search Party does this by turning individual Ring devices into a surveillance network. Each camera uses AI to identify pets running across its field of vision and all feeds are pooled together to potentially identify lost animals. I've never seen a slope quite so slippery, as the technology could...

item.title: Save $100 On Our Favorite Home Printer
item.description: The Epson ET-2980 is a great value at its full price, and the discount sweetens the deal.

item.title: Samsung mise sur la fluidité avec son écran QHD Odyssey G5 G50F 32″ en promo qui tourne à 180 Hz
item.description: Les écrans Samsung Odyssey G5 sont de vraies bonnes références pour jouer dans d'excellentes conditions et vous retrouvez la version 32 pouces du G5 G50F pour 219,99 euros au lieu de 249,99 euros.

item.title: So, what’s going on with Musicboard?
item.description: Is Musicboard shutting down? Company says no, but users are worried.

item.title: Free Mobile : des abonnés privés du nouveau VPN, l’incompréhension règne
item.description: Le forfait Free 5G promet désormais une navigation sécurisée grâce à un VPN inclus. Pourtant, une partie des fidèles de l'opérateur se retrouve exclue de ce service, bien qu'ils paient le même prix que les autres. Une anomalie technique héritée du passé qui passe mal.

item.title: Everything borrowers need to know about student loan repayment plans and collections
item.description: If you’re a student loan borrower, here are some key things to know. It’s been a confusing time for people with student loans. Collections restarted, then were put on hold. At the same time, borrowers had to stay on top of changes to key forgiveness plans.

item.title: When will Wicked: For Good be streaming? What to know to watch it at home.
item.description: Find out how to watch "Wicked: For Good" at home, including when and where it will be streaming.

item.title: Harvey reportedly raising at $11B valuation just months after it hit $8B
item.description: After announcing $190 million in ARR in December, Harvey may be raising again a big leap in valuation.

item.title: I tested the Lenovo ThinkPad T14s 2-in-1 Gen 1 - a fresh spin on my favorite portable business laptop
item.description: The Lenovo ThinkPad T14s 2-in-1 Gen 1 brings convertibility to the T-Series ThinkPad family, adding yet another feature to a long-standing lineup.

item.title: Dépendance chez les enfants | Ouverture du procès de Meta et YouTube aux États-Unis
item.description: Le procès de Meta et YouTube s’est ouvert lundi devant un tribunal civil de Los Angeles, où 12 jurés devront déterminer si les deux groupes ont sciemment conçu leur plateforme pour rendre les enfants dépendants.

item.title: Workday CEO Eschenbach departs, with co-founder Aneel Bhusri returning as CEO
item.description: Bhusri said in a statement that the company's next chapter would be focused on AI.

item.title: Amazons early Presidents Day deals include discounts on Apple, Roborock, and more
item.description: Shop Amazon's early Presidents' Day deals on robot vacuums, AirPods, Legos, and more.

item.title: Lyft opens its ride-hailing app to teens
item.description: Rival Uber started allowing teens to use the app two years ago.

item.title: Hacked, leaked, exposed: Why you should never use stalkerware apps
item.description: According to TechCrunch’s ongoing tally, including the most recent data spill involving uMobix, there have been at least 27 stalkerware companies since 2017 that are known to have been hacked, or leaked customer and victims’ data online.

item.title: Get two years of NordVPN's Complete plan for 70 percent off
item.description:
NordVPN is having a big sale on its two-year plans right now. The Complete tier, for example is 70 percent off, bringing the price of 24 months down to just $130. NordVPN regularly appears on Engadget’s list of the best VPN services thanks to its wide server network, strong security tools and consistent performance across devices. NordVPN’s latest promotion puts one of its most comprehensive plans at a price that undercuts many competing premium VPN subscriptions.
The Complete tier includes full access to NordVPN’s core VPN service, which encrypts internet traffic and masks a user’s IP addre...

item.title: We Saw a Huge Chunk of ‘Project Hail Mary’ and Expectations Couldn’t Be Higher
item.description: io9 was among a group of journalists speaking to directors Phil Lord and Chris Miller about their upcoming film.

item.title: BridgePay payments system knocked offline by ransomware attack
item.description: US Secret Service gets involved, as merchants report cash payments only.

item.title: 'Today, the real standard is no longer simply 'wire-free' but 'senseless intelligence' – whether the robot can be like an invisible gardener' – Segway Navimow CEO on the changing focus of robot mowers
item.description: Exclusive: I chatted to the CEO of one of the leading lawnbot brands to get his take on the changing landscape of robot mowers.

item.title: Whoopi Goldberg: “I’m not good at relationships”—but she’s wildly successful. Here’s why that matters.
item.description: The 70-year-old EGOT winner has a phenomenal career, but chooses to stay single. It’s a breath of fresh air. Whoopi Goldberg has been a household name since she starred in The Color Purple in 1985. Fast forward over 50 years, and she’s still as driven as ever. Goldberg, 70, cohosts daytime talk show The View. In 2024, she founded AWSN, the All Women’s Sports Network. She’s also an author, activist, mother, and grandmother. ...

item.title: Et si Elon Musk jouait avec la météo depuis l’espace ?
item.description: Et si l’humanité apprenait à dompter le Soleil ? Elon Musk semble prêt à franchir un nouveau cap, mêlant conquête spatiale et géo-ingénierie planétaire. Derrière ses derniers tweets, un projet se dessine : un réseau orbital capable d’exploiter l’énergie solaire, voire de contrôler la température...

item.title: AI-generated ads dropped the ball at this year’s Super Bowl
item.description: It feels like everyone who produced ad spots for this year's Super Bowl with generative AI failed in terms of making gen AI seem useful or like something worth getting excited about. Though we've seen plenty of AI-generated commercials before (at previous Super Bowls, no less), this year's event was oversaturated with them. That's in […]

item.title: The 'ultimate power solution': Save $1400 on our five-star rated EcoFlow home backup system at Best Buy for President's Day
item.description: EcoFlow is running a major President’s Day deal, with the Delta Pro 3 portable whole-home power station discounted by $1,399, a 41% saving.

item.title: I test XR glasses for a living, and this $35 accessory is a must-buy if you hate how quickly your device’s battery drains
item.description: Got XR glasses? Save yourself from battery troubles and get a cheap USB-C adapter like this one from RayNeo.

item.title: Ferrari’s first EV will have an interior designed by Jony Ive
item.description: Ferrari released the first interior images of the company's first all-electric supercar, called the Ferrari Luce ("light" in Italian). This is the second time the Italian automaker has teased the Luce (formerly Elettrica) without showing us the actual car, or even a silhouette. But the interior images should suffice given the bold-faced name of the […]...

item.title: National Pizza Day 2026 is here — celebrate with deals and freebies from 7-Eleven, Chuck E. Cheese, and more
item.description: National Pizza Day 2026 takes place on Feb.9. Get free pizza and discounts from 7-Eleven, Chuck E. Cheese, and more.

item.title: Dunkin is giving away free iced coffee on Feb. 9 — use this promo code to qualify
item.description: How to get free coffee from Dunkin' — get a free iced coffee with this promo code on Feb. 9.

item.title: TV upgrade in order? Snag the Hisense 85-inch QD7 Mini LED TV while its $500 off.
item.description: Ugprade your TV to the Hisense 85-inch QD7 Mini LED QLED 4K TV while it's on sale for $500 off at Amazon and Best Buy.

item.title: Bad Bunny Super Bowl Halftime Show Easter eggs: 15 things you might have missed
item.description: Every hidden reference, political symbol, and community tribute woven into Bad Bunny's historic Super Bowl Halftime Show.

item.title: Anthropic closes in on $20B round
item.description: The company raised $13 billion in equity funding just five months ago, but intense competition between frontier labs and the ongoing cost of compute have made them eager to raise as quickly as possible.

item.title: Amazon retire 34 % sur cette batterie externe Ugreen de 25 000 mAh (145 W) qui recharge 3 appareils en même temps
item.description: Compacte, puissante et capable de recharger jusqu’à trois appareils en simultané, la batterie externe Ugreen Nexode 145 W s’impose vite comme un indispensable du quotidien. Bonne nouvelle : elle est affichée à seulement 54 € au lieu de 82 € sur Amazon.

item.title: McDonald’s is giving away caviar kits. Here’s how to actually get one
item.description: The McNugget Caviar drop happens Feb. 10 online only. Timing and the right link matter. Valentine’s Day is known as the day to celebrate all things love—and also a day for expensive dates. However, a new offering from one of your favorite fast food chains may have you skipping the white table cloths and snagging something from McDonald’s instead.

item.title: Jony Ive Designed the Interior for Ferrari’s New EV, Take a Look Inside
item.description: The Italian luxury sports car company and Jony Ive’s creative collective LoveFrom have been working on the car for the past five years.

item.title: Last-minute shopping for Valentines Day? Two of our Dyson beauty favorites are $150 off.
item.description: Save $150 on the Dyson Airwrap i.d. and Dyson Supersonic Nural as of Feb. 9.
